description: '''Ricky Terrell Dunigan''' (November 17, 1973 â€“ December 20, 2013), known professionally as '''Lord Infamous''', was an American rapper from [[Memphis, Tennessee|Memphis]], [[Tennessee]]. He was the half-brother of [[DJ Paul]] and one of the co-founders of [[Three 6 Mafia]]. His lyrics touched on macabre subjects such as [[Satanism]], [[mass murder]], and [[torture]], along with more traditional themes such as [[sex]] and [[drug]] use.
